mapper.select: SELECT R.RNUM, R.BNUM, R.USERID, R.CONTENT, R.LIKECNT,R.DISLIKECNT,R.RESTEP, R.RELEVEL, TO_CHAR(R.REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REGDATE, TO_CHAR(R.MODIFYDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MODIFYDATE, NVL(UM.STATE,'0') STATE FROM REPLY R LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM USERMANAGE WHERE GUBUN = '2' AND USERID = #{userid}) UM ON (R.RNUM = UM.NUM) WHERE BNUM = #{bnum} ORDER BY RESTEP
